entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix pipeline run title in Roslyn PR Validation #59501
  • Copying and pasting a variable matching an already imported type name will add another using if there's another type with that name #59499
  • Compiler should provide a better error message for generic type constraint 'enum' #59495
  • Keyword completion for top-level statements is showing up in C#8 #59489
  • Event handler tab-completion does not work in new project templates #59488
  • Incremental source generator not called in production build context #59487
  • Variables in list, recursive and var patterns are not colorized as local #59484
  • Move static members to another type is suggested for top-level statements #59470

Closed

  • Semantic classification and other features fail in VS for no apparent reason #59506
  • "Add parameters to constructor" context action should maintain constructor parameter wrapping #49040
    Backlog
  • IDE0028 breaks working code #47632
    17.2
  • #endif is seen as LeadingTrivia of namespace instead of TrailingTrivia of using statement #59496
  • List patterns: x is [..var y] with a custom collection type causes a crash #59466
  • CS8604 false positive 'possible null reference argument' when null is excluded in a query. #59172
  • Test plan for "checked operators" #59196
    17.2
  • `Invert If` analyzer should be aware of Is / IsNot complementation. #51359
  • 'Add parameter' should respect wrapping of existing parameters. #58040
    17.2
  • new() not respecting nullable struct #57777
    17.2
  • "IDE0090: 'new' expression can be simplified" changes the behavior for Nullable<T> #54081
    17.2
  • IDE0090 incorrectly suggested for `new` expression #50735
    Backlog
  • Wrap Properties is unavailable in recoverable syntax failure conditions #38986
    Backlog
  • Move to block body refactoring dropping trivia #53532
    17.2
  • Wrap array initializer expressions. #37428
    Backlog
  • IDE0057 Substring can be simplified - Should not apply in expression trees #49347
    Backlog
  • Error in VB code for code style sample for prefer System.HashCode #49678
    Backlog
  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.GenerateMethodInClosedFile times out #57722
    17.1
  • Typo in DocumentPullDiagonsticHandlerProvider file name and class name #57319
    17.2
  • Use 'is null' check is suggesting 'is object' instead of 'is null' #58483
    17.2
  • Static constructors in interfaces miss the syntax highlighting #55313
    17.2
  • Code Fix Error in Visual Studio #53574
    Backlog
  • Incorrect namespace in Features core layer #49239
    Backlog
  • Refactoring to implement explicitly an interface should remove default parameter values #52020
    Backlog
  • NRE in DeclarationNameCompletionProvider.ProvideCompletionsAsync #59463
  • Show pattern formats in intellisense for DateTime.ToString #17011
    Backlog
  • I am unable to convert a DateTime.Now variable ToString("H") #49471
    Backlog
  • Test failure in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Emit.UnitTests.dll #57560
    17.2
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57146
    17.2
  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    17.2
  • IDE0055 in target-typed new with collection initializers #58157
    17.2
  • Go to Symbol does not work for record fields #57873
    17.2
  • [Flaky Test] VisualBasic.BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences #57980
    17.1
  • Flaky test: Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpCodeActions.FastDoubleInvoke #57551

PullRequests

Created

  • More options refactoring #59508
    Area-IDE
  • Remove obsolete internal API #59507
    Area-IDE
  • NavigationOptions refactoring #59505
    Area-IDE
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Use segmented arrays for VirtualChar storage #59503
    Area-IDE
  • Only subscribe to ActiveDocumentChanged if solution cralwer is enabled #59498
    Area-IDE
  • Update Language Feature Status for pattern matching on ReadOnlySpan<char> #59497
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements" #59492
    Area-IDE
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support extended property patterns in 'use recursive' refactoring #59490
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add telemetry to log analyzer execution times during background analysis #59480
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • List-patterns: report error when no suitable length member #59475
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Implement Initializer expression wrappers #39878
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community, Next
  • Add a few asserts/throws to our CodeModel implementation #59500
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Let Import Completion check for global usings auto-generated by SDK #59360
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Inverting TypeOf should support 'TypeOf x IsNot...' #59460
    Area-IDE, Next
  • List-patterns: list-patterns may be always-true #59478
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Fix test plan link for checked operators #59494
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59485
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix a few issues with use object/collection initializer. #59479
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 'Add selected parameters to constructor' should respect existing user formatting #59432
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix build break caused by different merged PRs conflicting #59483
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59482
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59481
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Change json detection from a suggestion to a refactoring #59422
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer 'use index/range' in an expression tree #59477
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Include record primary constructor props in nav-to when not backed by a corresponding field/prop. #59437
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Suppress formatting with implicit object initializers #59430
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve 'use pattern matching' to use `is null` instead of `is not object` #59464
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not use implicit object creation on nullable struct types #59438
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support wrapping constructs even in the presence of some recoverable errors #59385
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove integration tests that are already ported to the new project #59457
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve trivia handling in use-block body. #59448
    Area-IDE, Next
  • FIx vb example text #59476
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fxi mispeeling #59440
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix the titles we show the user for the 'use is null' fixers #59409
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Classify interface static constructors #59442
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not use 'var' when fixing the return type of method #59447
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59461
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Generate proper explicit interface impls #59459
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Batch file notifications and acquire locks asynchronously #59441
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Move workspace file removal to BG to avoid UI delay" #59472
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServieHub project - take 3 #59316
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry 16.4.29 #59426
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples, Next
  • Ide analyzer options #58765
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Move option to right category #59425
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Move cancellation catch up out of the navigate to searcher #59439
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Avoid directly exposing temporary storage streams #59431
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix "Add Constructor Parameter From Members" for partial classes #59450
    Area-IDE
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • List-patterns: Fix definite assignment crash #59285
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Update breaking changes document for 17.0 struct initializer fixes #59245
    Area-Compilers
  • Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Pass exception into internal error diagnostic #59443
    Area-Interactive
  • Assert diagnostics pass correct number of arguments #59419
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Simplify the wrapping code for initializer-expression wrapping #59397
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for decoding required members in metadata #59288
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix typos #59237
    Area-Compilers
